name: Beauty of Nature
description:
Do you have a tragic backstory ?

Family lost in a fire ? Squandered the family fortune in an orgy of drug and sex addiciton ? Murdered and entire village of small children as a gun for hire ?

No matter why you want to erase your former self the Federated Conservation Service offers you a new life.

A Term of Service* in the Federated Conservation Service garauntees citizenship in one of three participating government conglomerates !

Save the genetic information of flora and fauna across the galaxy ! Take the fight to invasive species ! Join extremely safe** scientific expeditions to newly colonised worlds !

Join the Federated Conservations Service today !

*conditions apply.

**Actual safety may vary.

--
Build on Unity 2021.2.3f using Game Creator 2, The Vegetation Engine, Vegetation Studio Pro and of course Gena Pro. Speacial guests MK_Glow and Amplify Imposters.

Original music by https://geraldclarkaudio.itch.io/

SFX - selections from my audio library of royalty free / licensed stuff

Vegetation - Alien Forest by Manufactura4k and CVP Artificial Cells by Alexander Elert

All other art (ship, slugs, hive, bone bridge) by me (maya/zbrush/rizom/substance)

Base terrain design done in World Creator 2, imported as a raw heightmap into Unity and modified with Gena Pro.

Prototype vegetation placement with Gena Pro and finalised with Vegetation Studio Pro for Instanced Indirect rendering.
